amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-163 to require the Department of Treasury to submit a report to Congress regarding its efforts to work with Federal bank regulators, financial institutions, and money service businesses to ensure that legitimate financial transactions along the southern border move freely.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. McSally.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
